page.title: 08GENERAL:D.C.L.-MENSTRIE
page.content: The factory has a three shift system and daywork personnel supported by maintenance departments. The total work force is approx 430. The D.C.L is a branch of the Food Group of the Distillers Company p.l.c. Raw materials are transported to the factory by train or truck. The railway is only used for the D.C.L's requirments. While the trucks are used for the distribution of finished products. Scottish Grain stores millions of gallons of whisky on the same industrial site as the D.C.L. Most of the supervision of the vats and bonds have been taken over by computers which were installed recently and only need a couple of personnel for maintenance.
